mapper.select: select id, account, password, email, sex, money, status, id_card, id_card_cipher_id, id_card_cipher_text, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from cms_user where id = #{id}

select id, account, password, email, sex, money, status, id_card, id_card_cipher_id, id_card_cipher_text, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from cms_user where account = #{account}
mapper.insert: insert into cms_user(account, password, email, sex, money, status, id_card, id_card_cipher_id, id_card_cipher_text, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{account}, #{password}, #{email}, #{sex}, #{money}, #{status}, #{idCard}, #{idCardCipherId}, #{idCardCipherText}, #{isDeleted}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into cms_user(account, password, email, sex, money, status, id_card, id_card_cipher_id, id_card_cipher_text, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.account}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.money}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.idCard}, #{entity.idCardCipherId}, #{entity.idCardCipherText}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into cms_user(account, password, email, sex, money, status, id_card, id_card_cipher_id, id_card_cipher_text, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.account}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.money}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.idCard}, #{entity.idCardCipherId}, #{entity.idCardCipherText}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update account = values(account), password = values(password), email = values(email), sex = values(sex), money = values(money), status = values(status), id_card = values(id_card), id_card_cipher_id = values(id_card_cipher_id), id_card_cipher_text = values(id_card_cipher_text), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update cms_user
account = #{account},
password = #{password},
email = #{email},
sex = #{sex},
money = #{money},
status = #{status},
id_card = #{idCard},
id_card_cipher_id = #{idCardCipherId},
id_card_cipher_text = #{idCardCipherText},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
update cms_user set account="deerere" where id=1 ;
